snippet.title: Seeds of Resilience - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Let's build your civilization in this turn-based city builder where environment is more important than everything.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/877080/Seeds_of_Resilience/
Itch.io page: https://goblinzstudio.itch.io/seeds-of-resilience

Developer: Subtle Games
Publisher: Goblinz Studio / Maple Whispering
